body_html:
@zheng-xq

CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL in cudnn.h described as follows:

#if !defined(CUDNN_H_)
#define CUDNN_H_

#define CUDNN_MAJOR 4
#define CUDNN_MINOR 0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 7

#define CUDNN_VERSION (CUDNN_MAJOR * 1000 + CUDNN_MINOR * 100 + CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL)
body_text:
@zheng-xq
CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL in cudnn.h described as follows:
#if !defined(CUDNN_H_)
#define CUDNN_H_
#define CUDNN_MAJOR      4
#define CUDNN_MINOR      0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 7
#define CUDNN_VERSION    (CUDNN_MAJOR * 1000 + CUDNN_MINOR * 100 + CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL)
body:
@zheng-xq 

### CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL in cudnn.h described as follows:

#if !defined(CUDNN_H_)
#define CUDNN_H_

#define CUDNN_MAJOR      4
#define CUDNN_MINOR      0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 7

#define CUDNN_VERSION    (CUDNN_MAJOR \* 1000 + CUDNN_MINOR \* 100 + CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL)
